amendatorysection.catchline: License under Child Care Licensing Act; denial of license or disciplinary act authorized.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Health and Human Services may deny the issuance of or take disciplinary action against a license issued under the Child Care Licensing Act to a participating applicable child care or early childhood education program for failure to comply with the Step Up to Quality Child Care Act.

crossreference.para: Child Care Licensing Act, see section 71-1908.
